ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants, of Toronto, Ontario, as auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2014; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2014.
